__e: Well, there's nobody up here we can't live without.
Is there a reason we can't do this face-to-face?
Spare me some power and mercy and give it to that boy until the day we meet each other again...
If there's anything we can do to help...
And when it's the end, maybe the most we can do for that person is... help them along.
There's nothing we can do to change what is meant to be
And now there's a kid out there, somewhere, hurting, and there's nothing we can do.
We look in the pipe, if there's nothing there, nothing we can do... we just drive on home and call the cops.
Things are different for people like them than they are for people like us and there's bloody naught we can do about it.
There's no reason we can't be friends.
Just... because we can't be together doesn't mean I won't love you.
I'm sorry that we can't make that work for you.
'Never forget, my love, 'everything I do is so that we can be together again.
You sure I haven't, I haven't done anything... to make you, make you mad at me?
I spent the last six weeks doing everything I promised so that we could be together, which is what I thought you wanted too.
Okay, I know, we asked him to keep it as a surprise... until you and I could have this conversation.
This is as close as we can get to a happy ending, I think... being able to do some good before the end.
Maybe this happened so that you and I could have another chance.
